abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Tamara Solyanyk
            at the meeting of July 12, 2001 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy progress report, the Programmatic
            Financial and Public Sector Adjustment and the Agricultural
            Reform Implementation Project for Turkey.
